name: fire-fang
flavor_text: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target and a separate $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect_text_simple: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
